DOC.HEADLINE: LET THE MATCHES BEGIN : THE SCHEDULE
DOC.TEXT: Below is the 1994 World Cup soccer schedule , with the networks carrying live TV broadcasts in parentheses . FIRST ROUND Friday Germany vs . Bolivia at Chicago , noon ( ESPN , Univision ) Spain vs . South_Korea at Dallas , 4:30 p.m. ( ESPN2 , Univision ) Saturday United States vs . Switzerland at Pontiac , Mich. , 8:30 a.m. ( ABC , Univision ) Italy vs . Ireland at East Rutherford , N.J. , 1 p.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) Colombia vs . Romania at Rose Bowl , 4:30 p.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) Sunday , June 19 Belgium vs . Morocco at Orlando , Fla. , 9:30 a.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) Norway vs . Mexico at Washington , 1 p.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) Cameroon vs . Sweden at Rose Bowl , 4:30 p.m. ( ESPN2 , Univision ) Monday , June 20 Brazil vs . Russia at Stanford , 1 p.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) Netherlands vs . Saudi_Arabia at Washington , 4:30 p.m. ( Univision ) Tuesday , June 21 Argentina vs . Greece at Foxboro , Mass. , 9:30 a.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) Germany vs . Spain at Chicago , 1 p.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) Nigeria vs . Bulgaria at Dallas , 4:30 p.m. ( ESPN2 , Univision ) Wednesday , June 22 Romania vs . Switzerland at Pontiac , 1 p.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) United States vs . Colombia at Rose Bowl , 4:30 p.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) Thursday , June 23 Italy vs . Norway at East Rutherford , 1 p.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) South_Korea vs . Romania at Rose Bowl , 1 p.m. ( ABC ) Switzerland vs . Colombia at Stanford , 1 p.m. ( Univision ) Monday , June 27 Bolivia vs . Spain at Chicago , 1 p.m. ( ESPN2 , Univision ) Germany vs . South_Korea at Dallas , 1 p.m. ( ESPN ) Tuesday , June 28 Ireland vs . Norway at East Rutherford , 9:30 a.m. ( ESPN2 ) Italy vs . Mexico at Washington , 9:30 a.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) Brazil vs . Sweden at Pontiac , 1 p.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) Russia vs . Cameroon at Stanford , 1 p.m. ( ESPN2 ) Wednesday , June 29 Morocco vs . Netherlands at Orlando , 9:30 a.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) Belgium vs . Saudi_Arabia at Washington , 9:30 a.m. Thursday , June 30 Greece vs . Nigeria at Foxboro , 4:30 p.m. ( ESPN2 ) Argentina vs . Bulgaria at Dallas , 4:30 p.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) SECOND ROUND Saturday , July 2 Game 37 : Group C winner vs . Group_A , B or F third place at Chicago , 10 a.m. . ( ABC , Univision ) Game 38 : Group_A second place vs . Group C second place at Washington , 1:30 p.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) Sunday , July 3 Game 39 : Group F second place vs . Group_B second place at Dallas , 10 a.m. ( Univision ) Game 40 : Group_A winner vs . Group C , D or E third place at Rose Bowl , 1:30 p.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) Monday , July 4 Game 41 : Group F winner vs . Group E second place at Orlando , 9 a.m. ( Univision ) Game 42 : Group_B winner vs Group_A , C or D third place at Stanford , 12:30 p.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) Tuesday , July 5 Game 43 : Group D winner vs . Group_B , E or F third place at Foxboro , 10 a.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) Game 44 : Group E winner vs . Group D second place at East Rutherford , 1:30 p.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) QUARTERFINALS Saturday , July 9 Game 45 : Game 43 winner vs . Game 38 winner at Foxboro , 9 a.m. ( ABC , Univision ) Game 46 : Game 41 winner vs . Game 42 winner at Dallas , 12:30 p.m. ( ABC , Univision ) Sunday , July 10 Game 47 : Game 44 winner vs . Game 37 winner at East Rutherford , 9 a.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) Game 48 : Game 39 winner vs . Game 40 winner at Stanford , 12:30 p.m. ( ABC , Univision ) SEMIFINALS Wednesday , July 13 Game 47 winner vs . Game 45 winner at East Rutherford , 1 p.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) Game 48 winner vs . Game 46 winner at Rose Bowl , 4:30 p.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) THIRD PLACE Saturday , July 16 Semifinal losers at Rose Bowl , 12:30 p.m. ( ESPN , Univision ) CHAMPIONSHIP Sunday , July 17 Semifinal winners at Rose Bowl , 12:30 p.m. ( ABC , Univision )
